items.title: Dave Ramsey sounds alarm on major money mistake to avoid
items.description: The personal finance author and radio host has blunt words on solving a sensitive problem.

items.title: Amazon is selling a $400 cordless wet-dry vacuum for $190 that provides a 'professional level of cleaning'
items.description: Effortlessly sweep and polish all manner of household surfaces.

items.title: Once dominant beer brand closing down business, no bankruptcy
items.description: The groundbreaking craft brewery will close down operations on Nov. 4 after 25 years in business.

items.title: Amazon is selling a 'strong and secure' $133 keyless entry door handle for only $75
items.description: Reviewers say it's a "very simple DIY upgrade."

items.title: Aldi CEO sounds alarm over major concerning price changes
items.description: Aldi issues warning to consumers as pressures on retail intensify.
